BIC:

She stopped running when she entered a street just a little bi=
gger
that led to an open market. No use in trying to raise suspicions,
afte=
r all. 

She slowly walked in the marketplace but stayed on the edges, wher=
e
the hobboes and the rest of the dregs sat and begged for some spare
credi=
ts. She was beggining to feel drowsy and decided to sit down, at
least for =
some time. This place was regularly patrolled by cop-bots,
and now wasn't t=
he time to get their attention.
